languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит сухо.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, столь дерзкое обращение к духу машины категорически неприемлемо, даже в ситуации столь критичной, как на..."
{n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

{n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡干巴巴地念叨着。{/n}“大人，以如此粗暴的方式称呼机魂，这是绝对无法接受的行为。哪怕是在当下的危急情况下——”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡干巴巴地念叨着。{/n}“大人，以如此粗暴的方式称呼机魂，这是绝对无法接受的行为。哪怕是在当下的危急情况下——”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは辛辣に口を開く。{/n}「陛下、機械精霊にそのような無礼な態度で話しかけることは、たとえ今のような危機的な状況下であろうとも、決して容認できないことです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは辛辣に口を開く。{/n}「{mf|陛下|陛下}、機械精霊にそのような無礼な態度で話しかけることは、たとえ今のような危機的な状況下であろうとも、決して容認できぬことです…」
{n}パスカルは辛辣に口を開く。{/n}「陛下、機械精霊にそのような無礼な態度で話しかけることは、たとえ今のような危機的な状況下であろうとも、決して容認できないことです…」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal bemerkt trocken:{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, einen Maschinengeist derart rüde anzusprechen, ist grundsätzlich inakzeptabel, selbst in einer kritischen Lage wie der jetzigen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal bemerkt trocken:{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, einen Maschinengeist derart rüde anzusprechen, ist grundsätzlich inakzeptabel, selbst in einer kritischen Lage wie der jetzigen ..."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous reprend sèchement :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, s'adresser à un esprit de la machine d'une manière aussi brusque est proprement inacceptable, même dans une situation critique comme celle que nous connaissons aujourd'hui... »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous reprend sèchement :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, s'adresser à un esprit de la machine d'une manière aussi brusque est proprement inacceptable, même dans une situation critique comme celle que nous connaissons aujourd'hui... »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal responde con sequedad.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, dirigirse a un espíritu máquina de forma tan brusca es absolutamente inaceptable, incluso en una situación tan crítica como en la que...».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal responde con sequedad.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, dirigirse a un espíritu máquina de forma tan brusca es absolutamente inaceptable, incluso en una situación tan crítica como en la que...».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal soğuk ve tekdüze bir sesle söze giriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir makine ruhuna böylesine kabaca hitap etmek katiyen kabul edilemez. İçinde bulunduğumuz durum vahim olsa da..."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal intones dryly,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, addressing a machine spirit in such a brusque manner is categorically unacceptable, even in a critical situation such as we now—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal soğuk ve tekdüze bir sesle:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir makine ruhuna böylesine haşin bir şekilde yaklaşmak kategorik olarak kabul edilemez. Böylesi vahim bir durumda bile olsak..."
